posts.post_content:
Hi,

Trying to finish up this fairly short list of 206's. Not very concerned about condition, in fact anything too nice is probably out of my league. 2's or less I would say.
Here's what I need:
 
99 Collins, Eddie Philadelphia
155b Elbefeld-Washington portrait, 
157 Ellam,
172 Foster, 
175 Fritz,
193 Guiheen,
202 Helm, 
206 Hickman,
213 Hooker, 
229 Johnson-hands at chest, 
244 Kiernan,
264 Lajoie-w/bat, 
291 Manion, 
362 Otey, 
375 Perdue,
398 Revelle,
409 Ryan,
429 Shaughnessy,
441 Smith, Sid

Thanks, Bob       [url]biggies@aol.com[/url]
